page.title: 15THE TRELLECH MILKMAN.
page.content: THE MILKMAN WHO DELIVERS OUR MILK IS CALLED ROBERT HOLDER,AND HE IS 18 YEARS OLD. HE HAD BEEN WORKING FOR 2 OR 3 MONTHS. PEOPLE HAVE DIFFERENT TYPES OF MILK. YOU CAN HAVE PASTURIZED MILD,CHANNEL ISLAND MILK, SEMI-SKIMMED MILK,FULL SKIMMED MILK AND STERILSED MILK. THE MILKMAN HAS 290 CUSTOMERS. HE DELIVERS THE MILK IN A SUBARU PICKUP VAN. HE DELIVERS TO LYDART, TRELLECH, PENYFAN, CLEDDON, BOTANY BAY, CATBROOK, WHITELYE, BROADSTONE, PARKHOUSE, TRELLECH GRANGE. HE WORKS 6 DAYS A WEEK AND COLLECTS THE MONEY ON A SATURDAY. A PINT OF MILK COSTS BETWEEN 20 AND 26 PENCE. HE DELIVERS CREAM, EGGS, PAPERS, AND POP. THE MILKMAN STARTS THE MILK ROUND AT 6.15 AM AND FINISHES AT 2.00 PM.
